content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Yi-Nuo Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Hello Yi-Nuo, it's a pleasure to meet you. I'm sure you'll find the apartment to your liking. So, what price range were you considering for the rental?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you, Mister Schmidt. I'm looking for a fair price that reflects the value of the apartment. Since it's newly built and in the city center, I expect the price to be competitive. How much are you offering for this one-bedroom apartment?
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Yi-Nuo, I understand your expectations. The location and quality of the apartment definitely justify a higher price. I'm willing to start at 1,200 Euro per month. What do you think?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, 1,200 Euro per month seems a bit high for an unfurnished apartment, even though it's in the city center. Can we negotiate a lower price?
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I'm open to negotiation, Yi-Nuo. How much lower were you thinking? Remember, the location and amenities do command a premium.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Mister Schmidt. I was considering a price around 1,000 Euro per month. This would be more in line with the market rates for unfurnished apartments in the city center, in my opinion. What do you think?
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Yi-Nuo, 1,000 Euro per month is significantly lower than what I'm looking for. However, I'm willing to meet you halfway. How about 1,100 Euro per month? This is a fair compromise, considering the value of the apartment.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, 1,100 Euro per month is more acceptable. It's closer to the market rate and reflects the quality of the apartment. I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway. Shall we proceed with the paperwork at this price?
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I'm glad to hear that, Yi-Nuo. An agreement at 1,100 Euro per month is indeed a step closer to what I had in mind. Let's proceed with the paperwork. I'll have my lawyer draw up the lease agreement. Once you've reviewed and signed it, we can proceed with the rental. Is there anything else you need to discuss before we finalize the arrangement?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: No, Mister Schmidt. I'm satisfied with the price and the apartment. I'm looking forward to moving in and making it my home. Thank you for your time and effort in showing me the apartment. I'm ready to sign the lease agreement once it's ready.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Excellent, Yi-Nuo. I'm happy to have reached an agreement with you. You'll receive the lease agreement within the next few days. Once you've signed it and returned it to me, we'll be all set. Thank you for choosing my apartment. I'm sure you'll be very happy here. Is there anything else I can assist you with?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
